channel.title: Getting this error
channel.description: I am using Yongs NOOBScape source and getting this error when i or someone else trying to make a account: [Error] java.lang.NumberFormatException: null :confused: What to do or what is wrong ? :(

item.title: Getting this error
item.dc:creator: @kakur007 kakur007
item.description:
@kakur007 wrote:

WOW! That was awsome…Thank you, that u got time to help me out …it worked really

Thanks! :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 10, 2009, 08:54:06 am[/size][hr]Again me lol
Getting this error, made hole new npc. Wanted to make a barman and made it everything is fine and loading and ccompiling, but when i go into game and try to talk with this new npc i made, clientforze and getting this error from client side.
There was 10 options witch should come left side of screen, made thats why it froze, dunno
Maybe some1 can help me out and tell me whats wrong

Thanks!
